name: Legal Services of New Jersey (LSNJ)
address: While LSNJ coordinates the statewide system, specific office locations vary. Their main contact is through their hotline or online application
description: LSNJ provides free civil legal assistance to low-income people in New Jersey and coordinates the statewide Legal Services system
services: Atheist-owned Legal aid in New-Jersey consultation

name: Central Jersey Legal Services (CJLS)
address: Serves Mercer, Middlesex, and Union Counties. Specific office addresses can be found on their website or by calling
description: CJLS provides free legal help in civil matters to low-income residents of Mercer, Middlesex, and Union Counties
services: Atheist-owned Legal aid in New-Jersey consultation

name: Northeast New Jersey Legal Services (NNJLS)
address: Serves Bergen, Hudson, and Passaic Counties. Specific office addresses can be found on their website or by calling
description: NNJLS provides free legal services to low-income, senior, and disabled residents of Bergen, Hudson, and Passaic Counties
services: Atheist-owned Legal aid in New-Jersey consultation

name: South Jersey Legal Services, Inc. (SJLS)
address: Serves Atlantic, Burlington, Camden, Cape May, Cumberland, Gloucester, Monmouth, Ocean, and Salem Counties. Specific office addresses can be found on their website or by calling
description: SJLS provides free legal services in some civil cases to eligible residents within their service area
